description.en:
Tax Identification Number (NIP) is used for tax purposes and is assigned basically to any organization: companies including sole proprietorships, non-profits, government agencies.

NIP is assigned to organizations in process of their registration.

Till 2011 NIP number was also assigned to natural people (tax payers).

access.onlineAccessDetails: There is no Search is avaliable on https://wyszukiwarkaregon.stat.gov.pl/appBIR/index.aspx
access.guidanceOnLocatingIds:
1. Type in organization's NIP in the NIP field
2. Start by clicking "Szukaj"
3. Click on the first column (REGON number) to get details

NIP number consists of 10 digits, the last one is a check digit. For convenience the digits may be separated by non-significant hyphens (xxx-xxx-xx-xx or xxx-xx-xx-xxx for legal persons).

data.dataAccessDetails: There is no dedicated NIP registry website online, but NIP registry is searchable via REGON registry on https://wyszukiwarkaregon.stat.gov.pl/appBIR/index.aspx. There is an API available also: http://bip.stat.gov.pl/dzialalnosc-statystyki-publicznej/rejestr-regon/interfejsyapi/informacje-ogolne/
